title: Adams National Historical Park: Safety
body: Explore This Park    Plan Your Visit     Safety            Safety       Adams National Historical Park is located in the busy downtown neighborhood of Quincy, MA. For your safety and the protection of the historic homes, tour sizes are limited to 10 visitors per tour. The homes are not climate controlled and during extended periods of heat tours may be shortened for your safety. The homes have uneven surfaces and there are stairs to access the second floor of the Old House at Peace Field.   Large bags and backpacks are not permitted in the historic homes, please plan accordingly.  Please contact (617) 773-1177 or visit the park website for any park alerts regarding safety issues and tour operations.
